importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the article's publication, indicating when the incident and public reaction occurred.
The date of Doug Martin's NFL draft selection, highlighting his entry into professional football.
The year in which Martin had a standout season with 1,402 rushing yards and six touchdowns, showcasing his peak performance.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period during which Doug Martin played in the NFL, from his draft in 2012 through the end of his career in 2018.

keyTakeAways: Doug Martin, a former NFL running back, died after a brief struggle with police during a break-in investigation in Oakland.
Martin was a top-tier performer, selected as a first-team All-Pro and Pro Bowl selection multiple times during his career.
He is recognized as one of the top 50 players in Tampa Bay Buccaneers history, underscoring his lasting impact on the franchise.
His death has sparked public concern over police interactions with individuals, especially those with a history of public visibility and public trust.
The incident occurred during a routine investigation into a break-in, with police stating a brief struggle took place before Martin became unresponsive.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Former NFL running back Doug Martin died after a brief struggle with Oakland police during an investigation into a break-in at a home in Oakland. The incident occurred early Saturday, and Martin became unresponsive while being detained. He was taken to a hospital where he later died at age 36; the cause of death has not been released. Martin, a first-round draft pick in 2012 and a key performer with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, was named a first-team All-Pro and selected to the Pro Bowl in both 2012 and 2015. He is recognized as one of the top 50 players in Buccaneers history. His family has requested privacy, and Oakland’s mayor, Barbara Lee, expressed condolences. An autopsy is pending, and the incident has raised concerns about police interactions with individuals, especially those with public profiles.
title: Former NFL Player Doug Martin Dies After Police Detention During Break-In Investigation
